Author: Regnar#6164

Author: Regnar#6164
Content: it's been a lot of fun working on this GUI for the nSPV pywallet TonyL built. I just added some tabs to reduce clutter on screen, an active theme changer, and an address book which lets you add and delete a name to address in app that gets stored to a CSV file and loads it in when you start the GUI.

Author: dimxy#2587
Content:
found what was the problem in building libnspv on termux:
in libnspv/src/tools/cryptoconditions/src/include/secp256k1/Makefile.am there is unconditionally set -march=x86 option that breaks the compilation on termux @jl777c

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: good news! can you make a PR that fixes this?

Author: dimxy#2587
Content: ok
